Type.Name: RetrieveSurroundingArgs

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RetrieveSurroundingArgs extends GLib.SignalArgs

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The event invokes delegates which pass event data via this class.
